content: In late November, the unexpectedly and without advanced notice, cease operations and subsequently did not complete shipments which created product shortages for us in Q4 and to-date in Q1, we have made great strides in mitigating our sales and inventory exposure by sourcing through other vendors, which will fill the majority of the gap by the end of Q2, We've expanded our strategic relationship with existing partners and brought on new ones, which have set us up with better product quality, a more trend right assortment and improved service, as well as a direct delivery to our stores.
